description: Bottega Lucia serves a cuisine which is mainly Italian in style, with the addition of a few specialities from the Iberian Peninsula and other countries. Home-made pasta, meat and fish can be enjoyed in an attractive New York-style bistro, while the American bar serves drinks and a selection of delicious, tempting snacks in the evening.
